SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations

Class MyShelfieShadow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations.MyShelfieShadow
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieDecoration
Direct Known Subclasses:
MyShelfieDarkShadow, MyShelfieLightShadow
public abstract class MyShelfieShadow extends Object implements MyShelfieDecoration

MyShelfieShadow effect is one of the decorations created for custom components of the graphical user interface.

A high-level effect that renders a shadow of the given content behind the content with a:

  • Standard color, decided by subclasses (MyShelfieDarkShadow, MyShelfieLightShadow
  • Standard radius value defined in MyShelfieShadowType

Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emamuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:
  • MyShelfieDarkShadow
  • MyShelfieLightShadow
